General.Name: Yantai Longyuan Power Tech
General.Description: YanTai LongYuan Power Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of combustion control equipment and systems in the electric power field. It offers plasma ignition equipment and low-NOx combustion systems, and other related products, as well as power station operation intelligence software. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Yantai, China.
